name: The Trees
description:
You are the sun. You are the wind. You are the rain. Make the most beautiful trees in the world!

Relaxing game made in less than 24h for the Jamingtons game jam.

The Trees 0.2
-------------------------------------------------------------------
Updated features:
Fractal trees algorithm improved
Tree rendering optimized
Movement and animations softened
World movement changed

New features:
Mouse captured when playing (pause releases the mouse)
Simple leafs
Wet branches are blue
Tree movement (trees like the sun and react to wind)
World view
World shadow
Pause menu (with options to change the number of trees (8-128) and the music volume)
